Class MTSceneMenu

java.lang.Object

                      org.mt4j.components.visibleComponents.widgets.MTSceneMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMTComponent, IMTComponent3D, IMTInputEventListener, IGestureEventListener
public class MTSceneMenu
extends MTRectangle

The Class MTSceneMenu. A menu used in scenes to close the scene and/or pop back to another scene.

Author:
Christopher Ruff
